game_description: Shake Some Dice & Enjoy the Beach! As the sun slowly sets and the comfortable sea breeze blows over your body on the Gold Coast, you wear a sexy bikini, bathing in the lazy sunshine. Light music reaches your ear from a pub while your friends and you play the world-famous dice game. The ice in the whisky on your left hand is gradually melting away while the dice are flying in the hot air as you shake the cup with ardent passion. The sound of dice flowing in the hot air and the laughter of friends will make you forget any worries in life. Just enjoy this sheer joy and pleasure. Function Update: -New Sunshine Beath Scene -Bingo Multiplayer Mode Key Features: -Multiple Modes Available: Sunshine Beach & Deluxe Casino -Online Mode: Random Match & Play with Friends -Real-time Voice Chat & Analyze Your Opponent's Strategy -Party Atmosphere & Immersive Social Experience -Intelligent scoreboard helps you optimize combinations and check scores at any time. Rolling the Dice now!
review_1: I wanted to love this gave but it just wouldn't play right.
review_2: Very impressed by the animations and gameplay mechanics, but the one thing missing seems to be a tutorial for those people who have never played Yahtzee before. I could always look online for how to play but it would be better to be able to read the rules in game. It might be an idea to include (or even default to) a mode where the bunny girls are more appropriately dressed for non adult audience as the current attire may limit your market a little. Perhaps adding hand tracking at some stage. Well done and hopefully the game evolves a little over time
review_3: Why aren't there more ratings on here?? This is Awesome, Multi-player and Free!! A lil twist to black Jack!
review_5: Horribly glitchy and buggy. It is only ok if there were no glitches too. This game is nothing special. But if you still want it, use this link for 25% off: https://www.oculus.com/appreferrals/Lu_Million/4678365515608296/?utm_source=2
